Based on the user's constraints, I would recommend the following two movies from this list:
- "End of Watch" (2016) - This movie follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.
- "Flatliners" (1990) - This movie follows five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience  - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.
